welcome_message_body: Welcome to Arapongas, Brazil! Get ready to experience the charm of our city, known for its beautiful parks, vibrant culture, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Arapongas has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Apucarana Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.
